data.text:
@MitchTheJourney @ballyluskylass @CDCgov 😆😂🤣🤣😂😆😆🤣🤣😂😆😆🤣🤣😂🤣

The link was to a few month old site where anyone can post anything.

TOTALLY reputable!

You've been had. Just admit it.

@TheActualBrian @MitchTheJourney @CDCgov so right Bryan. Sad how real life knowledge and experience and data is not believed but information from an obscure source with no validation is thought of as truth. I say let those people go as they will never change their minds.

@MitchTheJourney @TheActualBrian @CDCgov It's your choice so don't get vaccinated. No argument there. We have beds available in our post-vax ward in the hospital if the beds in the COVID wards are full.

@MitchTheJourney @TheActualBrian @CDCgov And those of us in hospitals hid the patients in special rooms and had fake medical records I suppose. My 40 yrs of frontline experience must have been a dream...

@TheActualBrian @ballyluskylass @CDCgov I'm not intelligent buddy, it doesn't take a genius to understand Pfizer and the fda were trying to hide these reports for 75 years and were forced to release this now by the court. Dont believe me, keep watching cnn, pal. Its your life

@TheActualBrian @ballyluskylass @CDCgov I actually gave you the link and you won't investigate yourself. Your not interested in sources, you are a coward stuck in your lefty bubble. Have a nice day buddy, you just exposed yourself, as a coward. Let the media keep selling you boosters forever, its your life. Bye

@MitchTheJourney @ballyluskylass @CDCgov Oh, damn. You fell for it!

That's a rando site that allows anyone to post anything and claim any insane thing.

That site is less than three month old!

It's garbage.  You fell for an obvious deception because you WANT to believe that you're more intelligent than everyone else.
